entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
